title: Stonewall Medical Centre and Sexual Health Clinic – Brisbane
description: Stonewall Medical Centre has been proudly servicing the general health and sexual health of Brisbane’s lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, intersex and queer / questioning (LGBTQIA+), sex workers and the straight / heterosexual community since 1995. The clinic provides a variety of services including HIV PEP & PrEP, STI testing, consultations for sex workers, medical care for transgender and gender diverse individuals, steroid & image enhancing drug monitoring, and referrals among others.
